title: 20 mins to write a MySQL Shell Plugin
subtitle: Extend the MySQL Shell with a plugin created from scratch
abstract: MySQL Shell is a new client for MySQL. It comes with multiple functionalities like the adminAPI commands to setup and operate a MySQL InnoDB Cluster but also check for upgrades, import JSON, parallel import and more... It also allows you to communicate with the MySQL Server in SQL, Python or Javascript ! During this session we will write a plugin from scratch to extend the Shell using the MySQL Shell Plugin Framework. The code will be written live in Python.
